entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
